judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order for new trial affirmed.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Loncaric v. Lucas, Appellant.
Argued March 21, 1963.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
James J. Burns, Jr., with him Burns & Manley, for appellant.
Leonard J. Paletta, with, him McArdle, Harrington S McLaughlin, for appellee.
April 16, 1963:
